links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A031368(n+1) modulo A000040(n). - _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013For n > 8, a(n) = prime(2n+1) - 2*prime(n). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 30 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prime(2*n+1) % prime(n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013(PARI) v=vector(100,i,1);p=2;q=5;for(n=2,#v,q=nextprime(nextprime(q+1) + 1); p=nextprime(p+1);v[n]=q%p); v \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 30 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Missing term a(57) inserted by _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013
